metadata.title: CVE-2024-31503 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect access control in Dolibarr ERP CRM versions 19.0.0 and before,allows authenticated attackers to steal victim users' session cookies andCSRF protection tokens via user interaction with a crafted web page,leading to account takeover.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
